fields.name: schemavsn
fields.doc: schema version used

fields.name: publisher
fields.doc: origin of alert packet

fields.name: objectId
fields.doc: object identifier or name

fields.name: jd
fields.doc: Observation Julian date at start of exposure [days]

fields.name: fid
fields.doc: Filter ID (1=g; 2=R; 3=i)

fields.name: pid
fields.doc: Processing ID for science image to facilitate archive retrieval

fields.name: diffmaglim
fields.doc: Expected 5-sigma mag limit in difference image based on global noise estimate [mag]

fields.name: pdiffimfilename
fields.doc: filename of positive (sci minus ref) difference image

fields.name: programpi
fields.doc: Principal investigator attached to program ID

fields.name: programid
fields.doc: Program ID: encodes either public, collab, or caltech mode

fields.name: candid
fields.doc: Candidate ID from operations DB

fields.name: isdiffpos
fields.doc: t or 1 => candidate is from positive (sci minus ref) subtraction; f or 0 => candidate is from negative (ref minus sci) subtraction

fields.name: tblid
fields.doc: Internal pipeline table extraction ID

fields.name: nid
fields.doc: Night ID

fields.name: rcid
fields.doc: Readout channel ID [00 .. 63]

fields.name: field
fields.doc: ZTF field ID

fields.name: xpos
fields.doc: x-image position of candidate [pixels]

fields.name: ypos
fields.doc: y-image position of candidate [pixels]

fields.name: ra
fields.doc: Right Ascension of candidate; J2000 [deg]

fields.name: dec
fields.doc: Declination of candidate; J2000 [deg]

fields.name: magpsf
fields.doc: Magnitude from PSF-fit photometry [mag]

fields.name: sigmapsf
fields.doc: 1-sigma uncertainty in magpsf [mag]

fields.name: chipsf
fields.doc: Reduced chi-square for PSF-fit

fields.name: magap
fields.doc: Aperture mag using 14 pixel diameter aperture [mag]

fields.name: sigmagap
fields.doc: 1-sigma uncertainty in magap [mag]

fields.name: distnr
fields.doc: distance to nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog [pixels]

fields.name: magnr
fields.doc: magnitude of nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog [mag]

fields.name: sigmagnr
fields.doc: 1-sigma uncertainty in magnr [mag]

fields.name: chinr
fields.doc: DAOPhot chi parameter of nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog

fields.name: sharpnr
fields.doc: DAOPhot sharp parameter of nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog

fields.name: sky
fields.doc: Local sky background estimate [DN]

fields.name: magdiff
fields.doc: Difference: magap - magpsf [mag]

fields.name: fwhm
fields.doc: Full Width Half Max assuming a Gaussian core, from SExtractor [pixels]

fields.name: classtar
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy classification score from SExtractor

fields.name: mindtoedge
fields.doc: Distance to nearest edge in image [pixels]

fields.name: magfromlim
fields.doc: Difference: diffmaglim - magap [mag]

fields.name: seeratio
fields.doc: Ratio: difffwhm / fwhm

fields.name: aimage
fields.doc: Windowed profile RMS afloat major axis from SExtractor [pixels]

fields.name: bimage
fields.doc: Windowed profile RMS afloat minor axis from SExtractor [pixels]

fields.name: aimagerat
fields.doc: Ratio: aimage / fwhm

fields.name: bimagerat
fields.doc: Ratio: bimage / fwhm

fields.name: elong
fields.doc: Ratio: aimage / bimage

fields.name: nneg
fields.doc: number of negative pixels in a 5 x 5 pixel stamp

fields.name: nbad
fields.doc: number of prior-tagged bad pixels in a 5 x 5 pixel stamp

fields.name: rb
fields.doc: RealBogus quality score from Random Forest classifier; range is 0 to 1 where closer to 1 is more reliable

fields.name: ssdistnr
fields.doc: distance to nearest known solar system object if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: ssmagnr
fields.doc: magnitude of nearest known solar system object if exists within 30 arcsec (usually V-band from MPC archive) [mag]

fields.name: ssnamenr
fields.doc: name of nearest known solar system object if exists within 30 arcsec (from MPC archive)

fields.name: sumrat
fields.doc: Ratio: sum(pixels) / sum(|pixels|) in a 5 x 5 pixel stamp where stamp is first median-filtered to mitigate outliers

fields.name: magapbig
fields.doc: Aperture mag using 18 pixel diameter aperture [mag]

fields.name: sigmagapbig
fields.doc: 1-sigma uncertainty in magapbig [mag]

fields.name: ranr
fields.doc: Right Ascension of nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog; J2000 [deg]

fields.name: decnr
fields.doc: Declination of nearest source in reference image PSF-catalog; J2000 [deg]

fields.name: sgmag1
fields.doc: g-band PSF-fit magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: srmag1
fields.doc: r-band PSF-fit magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: simag1
fields.doc: i-band PSF-fit magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: szmag1
fields.doc: z-band PSF-fit magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: sgscore1
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy score of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec: 0 <= sgscore <= 1 where closer to 1 implies higher likelihood of being a star

fields.name: distpsnr1
fields.doc: Distance to closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: ndethist
fields.doc: Number of spatially-coincident detections falling within 1.5 arcsec going back to beginning of survey; only detections that fell on the same field and readout-channel ID where the input candidate was observed are counted. All raw detections down to a photometric S/N of ~ 3 are included.

fields.name: ncovhist
fields.doc: Number of times input candidate position fell on any field and readout-channel going back to beginning of survey

fields.name: jdstarthist
fields.doc: Earliest Julian date of epoch corresponding to ndethist [days]

fields.name: jdendhist
fields.doc: Latest Julian date of epoch corresponding to ndethist [days]

fields.name: scorr
fields.doc: Peak-pixel signal-to-noise ratio in point source matched-filtered detection image

fields.name: tooflag
fields.doc: 1 => candidate is from a Target-of-Opportunity (ToO) exposure; 0 => candidate is from a non-ToO exposure

fields.name: objectidps1
fields.doc: Object ID of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: objectidps2
fields.doc: Object ID of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: sgmag2
fields.doc: g-band PSF-fit magnitude of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: srmag2
fields.doc: r-band PSF-fit magnitude of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: simag2
fields.doc: i-band PSF-fit magnitude of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: szmag2
fields.doc: z-band PSF-fit magnitude of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: sgscore2
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy score of second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec: 0 <= sgscore <= 1 where closer to 1 implies higher likelihood of being a star

fields.name: distpsnr2
fields.doc: Distance to second closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: objectidps3
fields.doc: Object ID of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: sgmag3
fields.doc: g-band PSF-fit magnitude of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: srmag3
fields.doc: r-band PSF-fit magnitude of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: simag3
fields.doc: i-band PSF-fit magnitude of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: szmag3
fields.doc: z-band PSF-fit magnitude of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: sgscore3
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy score of third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec: 0 <= sgscore <= 1 where closer to 1 implies higher likelihood of being a star

fields.name: distpsnr3
fields.doc: Distance to third closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: nmtchps
fields.doc: Number of source matches from PS1 catalog falling within 30 arcsec

fields.name: rfid
fields.doc: Processing ID for reference image to facilitate archive retrieval

fields.name: jdstartref
fields.doc: Observation Julian date of earliest exposure used to generate reference image [days]

fields.name: jdendref
fields.doc: Observation Julian date of latest exposure used to generate reference image [days]

fields.name: nframesref
fields.doc: Number of frames (epochal images) used to generate reference image

fields.name: rbversion
fields.doc: version of Random Forest classifier model used to assign RealBogus (rb) quality score

fields.name: dsnrms
fields.doc: Ratio: D/stddev(D) on event position where D = difference image

fields.name: ssnrms
fields.doc: Ratio: S/stddev(S) on event position where S = image of convolution: D (x) PSF(D)

fields.name: dsdiff
fields.doc: Difference of statistics: dsnrms - ssnrms

fields.name: magzpsci
fields.doc: Magnitude zero point for photometry estimates [mag]

fields.name: magzpsciunc
fields.doc: Magnitude zero point uncertainty (in magzpsci) [mag]

fields.name: magzpscirms
fields.doc: RMS (deviation from average) in all differences between instrumental photometry and matched photometric calibrators from science image processing [mag]

fields.name: nmatches
fields.doc: Number of PS1 photometric calibrators used to calibrate science image from science image processing

fields.name: clrcoeff
fields.doc: Color coefficient from linear fit from photometric calibration of science image

fields.name: clrcounc
fields.doc: Color coefficient uncertainty from linear fit (corresponding to clrcoeff)

fields.name: zpclrcov
fields.doc: Covariance in magzpsci and clrcoeff from science image processing [mag^2]

fields.name: zpmed
fields.doc: Magnitude zero point from median of all differences between instrumental photometry and matched photometric calibrators from science image processing [mag]

fields.name: clrmed
fields.doc: Median color of all PS1 photometric calibrators used from science image processing [mag]: for filter (fid) = 1, 2, 3, PS1 color used = g-r, g-r, r-i respectively

fields.name: clrrms
fields.doc: RMS color (deviation from average) of all PS1 photometric calibrators used from science image processing [mag]

fields.name: neargaia
fields.doc: Distance to closest source from Gaia DR1 catalog irrespective of magnitude; if exists within 90 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: neargaiabright
fields.doc: Distance to closest source from Gaia DR1 catalog brighter than magnitude 14; if exists within 90 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: maggaia
fields.doc: Gaia (G-band) magnitude of closest source from Gaia DR1 catalog irrespective of magnitude; if exists within 90 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: maggaiabright
fields.doc: Gaia (G-band) magnitude of closest source from Gaia DR1 catalog brighter than magnitude 14; if exists within 90 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: exptime
fields.doc: Integration time of camera exposure [sec]

fields.name: drb
fields.doc: RealBogus quality score from Deep-Learning-based classifier; range is 0 to 1 where closer to 1 is more reliable

fields.name: drbversion
fields.doc: version of Deep-Learning-based classifier model used to assign RealBogus (drb) quality score

fields.doc: Observation Julian date at start of exposure [days]

fields.name: fid
fields.doc: Filter ID (1=g; 2=R; 3=i)

fields.name: pid
fields.doc: Processing ID for image

fields.doc: Expected 5-sigma mag limit in difference image based on global noise estimate [mag]

fields.name: pdiffimfilename
fields.doc: filename of positive (sci minus ref) difference image

fields.doc: Background level in sci image [DN]

fields.doc: Full sci image astrometric RMS along Dec. with respect to Gaia1 [arcsec]

fields.name: forcediffimflux
fields.doc: Forced difference image PSF-fit flux [DN]

fields.name: forcediffimfluxunc
fields.doc: 1-sigma uncertainty in forcediffimflux [DN]

fields.name: procstatus
fields.doc: Forced photometry processing status codes (0 => no warnings); see documentation
